metadata.notes: This is an example query - replace with your actual queries

_schema.description: SQL Query Collection for LanceDB Ingestion

required_fields.database: Database name: mariadb, postgres, etc. (optional, default: mariadb)
required_fields.query_type: Type: simple, analytical, operational, investigative (optional, default: simple)
required_fields.execution_time_ms: Query execution time in milliseconds (optional, default: 0.0)
required_fields.user_id: User who executed the query (optional, default: system)
required_fields.success: Whether query executed successfully (optional, default: true)
required_fields.timestamp: ISO timestamp when query was executed (optional, auto-generated if not provided)

metadata_fields.original_question: The natural language question that led to this SQL
metadata_fields.tables_used: Array of table names used in the query
metadata_fields.business_domain: Business area: sales, finance, hr, production, etc.

usage.1: Add your SQL queries to the 'queries' array above
usage.3: Queries will be embedded and stored in LanceDB for similarity search
